name: Odyssey VR
description: Odyssey VR, the innovative operating system by NexaSphere, offers a captivating social media experience in virtual reality. It serves as a gateway to connect, explore, and interact in diverse virtual landscapes, blending elements of social networking with immersive environments.

locations.name: Home
locations.description: Your personal VR space in Odyssey VR. This customizable home is where you can display items and memories collected during your virtual adventures. It's a reflection of your style and interests, a personal haven in the expansive digital universe of NexaSphere.

items.name: Virtual Aquarium
items.description: A customizable aquarium with virtual fish. Change scenes at will.

items.name: Holographic Plant Display
items.description: Displays holographic plants. Rearrange to your liking.

items.name: Interactive Art Gallery
items.description: Showcase digital art. Swap and arrange pieces as desired.

items.name: Virtual Bookshelf
items.description: Store and display VR books and magazines.

items.name: Cosmic Window
items.description: Displays various cosmic scenes, from galaxies to alien worlds.

containers.name: Memory Cube
containers.description: Store and revisit favorite VR moments.
